title: Anatomy Practical Education Design Utilizing Ultrasound Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of Basic Anatomy Knowledge and Teaching Experience
context.additional_context: Anatomy education competency enhancement course for pre-service and in-service teachers, operated with real-time practice centered on digital devices.

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic operation methods and safety protocols of ultrasound equipment
Learners can interpret and describe three-dimensional anatomical structures through ultrasound imaging
Learners can design practical training scenarios linking anatomy and ultrasound imaging
Learners can resolve technical issues that occur during ultrasound-based education
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
